# Research Positions

```{r employment, results='asis'}
tribble(
  ~Start, ~End, ~Position,
  2024, NA, "\\textbf{Research Fish Biologist}, Rocky Mountain Research Station, USDA Forest Service",
  2023, 2024, "\\textbf{Postdoctoral Fellow}, National Science Foundation (\\textit{host} Colorado State University)",
  2017, 2023, "\\textbf{Research Assistant}, Department of Biology, Purdue University",
  2014, 2016, "\\textbf{Research Assistant}, USGS Alaska Cooperative Fish and Widlife Research Unit, University of Alaska Fairbanks"
  ) |>
  arrange(-Start) |>
  mutate(
    Start = as.character(Start),
    End = as.character(End),
    End = tidyr::replace_na(End, "Present"),
    Years = if_else(End == Start,
      as.character(Start),
      paste(Start, "--", End, sep = ""),
      paste(Start, "--", End, sep = "")
    )
  ) |>
  select(Years, Position) |>
  baretable()
```

# Grants

```{r grants}
grants <- readr::read_csv("grant_income.csv")

sumgrants <- grants |> 
  filter(Status %in% c("Complete", "In progress")) |> 
  pull(Amount) |> 
  sum(na.rm = TRUE)
```

### I have acquired *`r scales::dollar_format()(sumgrants)`* in research grants (showing grants \>\$4999):

<!-- \vspace\*{0.2cm}\\enlargethispage\*{0.5cm} -->

```{r grants-table, results='asis'}
grants |>
  filter(Amount >= 5000) |>
  filter(Status %in% c("Complete", "In progress", "Pending")) |> 
  mutate(
    Time = paste0(Start, ifelse(is.na(End), "", paste0("--", End))),
    Entry = paste(
      Role, ". ``", Title, "''. ",
      "\\emph{Funding from ", Source, "}", ". Collaborators: ",
      Collaborators, ".",
      sep = ""
    ),
    Amount = dollars(Amount)
  ) |>
  arrange(desc(Time), desc(Amount)) |>
  select(Time, Entry, Amount) %>%  
  baretable(
    align = "lp{1.6cm}p{13.3cm}r",  
    # hline.after = c(0, NROW(.)),
    size = "\\fontsize{10}{12}",
    add.to.row = list(
      pos = as.list(seq(NROW(.))),
      command = rep("\\\\[-0.32cm]", NROW(.))
    )
  )
```

<!-- \vspace\*{0.2cm}\\enlargethispage\*{0.5cm} -->
